评论概述: The G in Angeles looks like a messed up Q
评论详情: Feels good but embroidery is not good at all. The G in Los Angeles looks wonky and could pass for a Q. Ordered a replacement because this is supposed to be a gift and I can’t give this to someone when the lettering looks weird. Needs better quality control.

Bought for my best friend as a Christmas gift! He’s never had Sherpa. I thought it would be too small, and that it was too “ bougie” of a style for my grunge skater bestie; but, I hoped that it fit well and ONCE HE FELT IT , he would fall in love! Thankfully, I WAS 100% on point! He rarely takes it off, and slept with it on Christmas night! It’s one of the top best gifts Ove given him, and I spoil that kid!  It’s top quality, definitely worth the price (I’m gonna buy at least 1 for myself!) I don’t think it shrank (if it did, wasn’t noticeable.) the style is “preppy,” but if a grunge skateboarding punk 30 yr old instantly fell in love with it- anyone will!

Very soft and comfortable. I like the unique checker pattern and the branding is tasteful.  My only drawback is that the sizing runs a bit small. I ordered an XL and it is very much more like a L or even a larger M. Something to keep in mind.
I like it it’s pretty warm for me I don’t know for others
Super soft but also thin material

My son loves this sweatshirt! Fits to size, comfortable, stylish, and warm. He has had multiple compliments on style when wearing.

The SOLY HUX hoodie is incredibly warm, thanks to the thick, fuzzy Sherpa lining, which makes it great for cold weather. However, it's bulkier than I expected, making it feel somewhat heavy and a bit restrictive. The graphic design is a nice touch, and the overall quality seems solid, but sizing runs a bit large. It's a good winter hoodie, but be prepared for a lot of material.
Maybe put it in the description, NO POCKETS!

If you are a woman, I would say size up over what you would normally wear because the arms run small. Other than that, this is warm and looks less like a monochromatic checkerboard than in the images. It's really enjoyable to be in and the hood is fantastic.
I love this OMG!! It is so cozy. I would have order a size larger just to be more comfortable tho.

The SOLY HUX Graphic Fuzzy Sherpa Pullover Hoodie is a fantastic winter essential! The fleece material is incredibly soft and warm, perfect for chilly days. My hubby loves the trendy graphic design, which adds a stylish touch to my casual outfits. The fit is true to size and allows for comfortable layering. Whether he's running errands or lounging at home, this hoodie keeps him cozy and looking great! Highly recommend for anyone looking for warmth without sacrificing style!

I got this for my son, I got him the 2XL, he is 6'5" tall and weighs 250 pounds, this fit him like a medium. It was so ridiculous looking, he wouldn't let me take a picture of him with it on, you just have to trust me on this one, They run extremely small. This is definitely not meant for big & tall men! It's very soft and feels well made, but because of how ridiculous the size is, I'm not giving it a high rating. This probably would have been great for an average size person, but since they offer the 2XL as a size, I figured we would be safe, especially looking at the measurements. My son is built like a football player, very broad shoulders and very solid.
Purchased for my grandson and he loves it. Was shipped quick and no complaints.
The sweater can be dressed up or down, and it fits well! The material super soft and warm
